001
002package com.commercetools.api.models.product;
003
004import java.util.Map;
005import java.util.Optional;
006import java.util.stream.Collectors;
007
008import javax.annotation.Nullable;
009
010import io.vrap.rmf.base.client.Accessor;
011import io.vrap.rmf.base.client.utils.json.JsonUtils;
012
013public class FacetResultsAccessor extends Accessor<FacetResults> {
014    public FacetResultsAccessor(FacetResults value) {
015        super(value);
016    }
017
018    @Nullable
019    public Map<String, FacetResult> facets() {
020        return asFacetResultMap(value);
021    }
022
023    @Nullable
024    public static Map<String, FacetResult> asFacetResultMap(FacetResults value) {
025        return Optional.ofNullable(value.values())
026                .map(values -> values.entrySet()
027                        .stream()
028                        .collect(Collectors.toMap(Map.Entry::getKey,
029                            entry -> JsonUtils.getConfiguredObjectMapper()
030                                    .convertValue(entry.getValue(), FacetResult.class))))
031                .orElse(null);
032    }
033}
